25 Jan 2020

Analyzing MacOS Malware that Executes a Payload in Memory

22 Jan 2020 This post was inspired by a Twitter post about a piece of MacOS malware created by the Lazarus Group. This malware has a special ability, it can load a Mach-O into memory and then execute it without it ever touching the disk.
